newsitem.title: USA: Inso Corp Q4 net income rises.
newsitem.headline: Inso Corp Q4 net income rises.

text.p: NOTE: (A) 17,420 for the year ended December 3l, 1996, excluding the $38,700 write-off related to in-process research and development purchased through the Electronic Book Technologies and ImageMark Software Labs acquisitions. The charges were not deductible for tax purposes.

(B) $1.24 per share for the year ended December 31, 1996, excluding the $2.96 per share write-off related to in-process research and development purchased through the Electronic Book Technologies, Inc. and ImageMark Software Labs acquisitions.

(C) $11,494 for the year ended December 31, 1995, excluding the $5,500 write-off related to in-process research and development purchased through the Systems Compatibility Corporation acquisition. The charge was not deductible for tax purposes.

(D) $0.94 per share for the year ended December 31, 1995, excluding the $0.44 per share write-off related to in-process research and development purchased through the Systems Compatibility Corporation acquisition.
(E) Includes $1,500,000, or $0.06 per share, of non-recurring revenue earned from royalty audits.
